title: Lag spikes after recent Ranked Maintenance - Confused why
body:
Hi there fellow summoners, recently I noticed lag after the recent ranked maintenance.

My ping would be stable around 40 MS but I would randomly lag, ping stays the same so when I try to auto attack, I would lose auto's and they would take 1-2 seconds to register as well as moving in game, I would walk up more than I input in my game and would also randomly move.


Has anyone else experienced this?

replies.body: I have the same issue! There's a delay when I click and sometimes my char just randomly move on its own. LOL. My ping is always 38ms. Minions were moving normal. Strange. Glad to know somebody who has similar issue as mine.
Yea... I found out my mouse was broken...

This sounds like packet loss or something degrading with your connection to the game server.   Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis of what's going on specifically for you.  Let me know what you find and we'll go from there.
HI there Porocles, I did the log reader and for every log for the past week I ran it says, No issues, yet I still am having this problem.

Sorry for the delayed resposne here, I'm just coming back from weekend.  It's good to hear the reader didn't result in errors, though it's strange that the issue continues here.  :/  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out individually.

Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs, and attach it to a ticket. 

In the meantime, try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well in case there are other instabilities that can be tuned up.  Otherwise, we'll see you through your ticket!

I'm having the same problem. 
https://i.gyazo.com/026667dc376cbaa8718e08e1bad3c1db.png
My ping is normally around 50ish.

Holy shit that is a pretty severe connection issue!!  This could be caused by a few reasons, so I recommend runningthrough every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any local possibilities of instability.  Be sure to test it in a custom game!

somehow I've managed to climb from silver 4 to silver 1 with it.. 
It's been rough to say the least

I'm having the same problem. I have about 54ms normaly but recently i spike to about 150+ , up to about 1000ms. it's unbearably  annoying and its stopping me from playing ranked or even normals. i really need an answer to this cause im tired of the lag.
